todos.content: Create standardized API error response system (lib/utils/api-error-response.ts)
Update /api/products/route.ts to use standardized error handling
Update /api/user/products/[id]/route.ts to use standardized error handling
Update /api/user/recipes/[id]/route.ts to use standardized error handling
Update remaining 6 API routes to use standardized error handling
Update test files to expect new error format
Run test suite and verify consistency across all endpoints
